Quest.Name: Rescue Operation
Quest.Description: Rescue VIPs and survivors scattered around the city of Prospect.

Objectives.Name: Briefing
Resolution: Speak to the mission handler.
Spoke to the mission handler and received instructions.

Objectives.Name: Find Equipment
Resolution: Equipment was stored by a fellow agent in a store with an orange roof.
Took a handgun and some supplies.
Took a strange crystal and some supplies.
Took a tazer and some supplies.

Objectives.Name: Find a Hideout
Resolution: I need to find a hideout for the VIPs and survivors. A secure building is preferable. The prison might be a good place.
I found the prison. The place seems secure enough, and also has an independant supply of water and electricity.

Objectives.Name: Secure the Prison
Resolution: I need to find the security central of the Prison and make sure the place is safe.
There seems to be no danger in the Prison.

Objectives.Name: Save the Prince
Resolution: The Prince should be holed up in his Palace. Given the possibility of looters, it would be best to send him to the Prison.
The Prince has reached the Prison and is safe and sound.
The Prince has died...

Objectives.Name: Save the Chief Advisor
Resolution: The Prince's most trusted advisor should be in a governmental building in the downtown area.
The Chief Advisor has reached the Prison and is safe and sound.
The Chief Advisor has died...

Objectives.Name: Save the Head Scientist
Resolution: The Head Scientist is in charge of the science facility on top of the mountain.
The Head Scientist has reached the Prison and is safe and sound.
The Head Scientist has died...
The Head Scientist has begun transcending, and refused to go to the Prison.

Objectives.Name: Save the Fellow Agent
Resolution: The agent who gathered supplies for me has been trapped in the slums, in an apartment building.
The agent has been rescued and sent to the Prison.
